summary: Preset for a character that looks like a very beautiful and seductive vampire (well, IMO, at least). Requires ECE
descriptionHtml:
Ashera- Seductive Vampire Preset
<br /><br /><br />Version:1
<br /><br /><br />Date: 1/7/2014
<br /><br /><br />Category: Saves and Presets
<br /><br /><br />Author(s): cchoay AKA Midnight Falcon
<br /><br /><br />Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7270
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Please do endorse this mod if you enjoy it. Helps to encourage me =)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Details
<br /><br /><br />=======
<br /><br /><br />A preset for ECE, featuring a seductive vampire beauty (or at least I like to think that she is)
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />She belongs to the YgNord race that is available in Enhanced Character Edit.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />The additional meshes and textures are included so that users only have to replace the default meshes and textures in the YgNord in order to look like the screenshot
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Her preset slot is slot 16
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Requirements
<br /><br /><br />============
<br /><br /><br />Enhanced Character Edit
<br /><br /><br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D12951%26preview%3D&pUp=1
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Installation
<br /><br /><br />=============
<br /><br /><br />1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
<br /><br /><br />2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
<br /><br /><br />3. Copy files to (install folder)SkyrimData
<br /><br /><br />4. Place the _16_commonTriRaces.slot file in (whatever directory)skyrimCME_Save
<br /><br /><br />5. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />History
<br /><br /><br />=======
<br /><br /><br />1.0, 01/07/28 - Initial release.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Contact
<br /><br /><br />=======
<br /><br /><br />You can find me on Nexus as cchoay
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Credits
<br /><br /><br />=======
<br /><br /><br />Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
<br /><br /><br />Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
<br /><br /><br />Thanks to the authors of the above listed mods for the mods that they have created
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Licensing/Legal
<br /><br /><br />===============
<br /><br /><br />You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
author: cchoay AKA Midnight Falcon
